title: Not responding error
body:
So,rito,i just got a leave buster because my client wasn t responding.WHY AM I GUILTY OF THAT?
I reconnected and then i was at the main page not in the champion select so please fix this or tell me i fis from my pc(which i don't think) and tell me if someone experienced something similar.

thx for responding.

replies.body:
It sounds like your client had a poor connection to our servers. I'd work through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure your settings are optimized to provide the best connection to League.

Let me know if those steps helped.
